What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Dear sir/madame,

I've been using Canva Android app for a while for my small business and have seen the developments over time.
Sadly your recent update has been a bit.. off. My overview of my designs has been some content; some designs look completely blank while others have missing pictures. The app is also extremely laggy and slows down my phone (while the previous version was pretty do-able).

I would like to recommend maybe a lighter version of the app or give people the option to downgrade it, or make specific versions available on your site (as I can see on the Google Play Appstore reviews that people have been complaining about the lag of newer versions as well).

If possible I can send you a screenshot of the design overview.

Thank you in advance for the assistance and hope to hear from you soon.

With kind regards,

Mrs. <NAME>.
